credit.credit-words: [α] The original score features a crotchet instead of a dotted crotchet.
[β] The original score features a minim instead of the dotted crotchet.
[γ] The original score features a dotted minim instead of a minim.
[δ] The original score features a minim instead of a dotted minim.
[ε]The original score features a dotted crotchet instead of a crotchet.
[ζ] The original score features a dotted crotchet instead of a minim.
[η] The original score features a minim instead of a crotchet.

Langsameres Tempo (aber doch bewegter als zum Schluß des Ritardandos)
